The '''End midlands''' is a biome used to generate [[Terrain features#Outer island|outer End island]]s.

== Description ==
This biome generates as part of the outer islands of [[the End]], forming the gradual slope from the hill-tops of each island down to the cliffs around the edge. [[End cities]] generate here, but [[chorus tree]]s do not.

{{HistoryTable

|{{HistoryLine||1.13|dev=18w06a|The outer islands of the End biome are now divided up into four separate biomes: The End - Floating Islands, The End - Medium island, The End - High island, and The End - Barren island.}}
